summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 18, Bell and Denny's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue and 3rd Avenue from Cedar Street to Clay Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14828 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
